The shimmering waters cascading amidst lush green surroundings are a visual delight and a delightful sig (Read More)ht to watch. These waterfalls in Kochi are famous tourist spots and are also popular among the localites for day-outings and picnics. The pool of water at the base of these waterfalls in Kochi is also used as a recreational swimming poll where people come to swim and have fun. Have a look at the list of the charming waterfalls in Kochi given below. Here is the list of 5 Waterfalls In And Around Kochi That You Definitely Must-Visit 1. Areekkal Waterfalls, Kochi - Most popular waterfall in Kochi Arrekkal Waterfalls is situated in Kochi and is one of the very few falls situated in the region. Boasting of immaculate surroundings, verdant green woods and a picturesque setting, the silvery cascading water atop rocky cliffs is a visual delight and a popular tourist spot of the city.Distance from Kochi: 40 kms Read More 2. Athirapally Falls, Kochi 4.2 /5 Located 86 km from the Kochi in Kerala, Athirapally Falls is a marvellous cascade of frothy waters that makes its way from the Anamudi mountains of the Western Ghats. This 80 ft high and 330 ft wide marvel is situated at the entrance of the Sholayar ranges and is often referred to as the "Niagara Falls of India". From here, the Athirapally falls flows through the verdant greenery of Vazhachal Forest toward the Arabian Sea, creating a spectacular vista of scintillating water, emerald jungles and azure sky.Distance from Kochi: 86 kms Read More 3. Vazhachal Falls, Thrissur 4.1 /5 View 9+ photos There are tree shades and sitting arrangement built around is a good place to relax with friends and family. The rocky falls are really a must visit spot. Vazhachal Falls is a popular picnic spot. Quality time can be spent here with the family. The place is located at a distance of 60 km from Thrissur city and 5 km from Athirapilly Falls. Vazhachal Falls near Kochi have dense forests of Sholayar ranges surrounding.Distance from Kochi: 80 kms Read More 4. Thommankuthu Falls, Idukki 4.3 /5 17 km off Thodupuzha lays this captivating Thommankuthu Falls, which is a seven-step waterfall near Kochi cascading down to form a pool. The location is best suited for trekking and rock climbing. Besides, facilities for many other activities such as boating, horse riding and fishing are also available.Distance from Kochi: 76 kms Read More Kochi Travel Packages Compare quotes from upto 3 travel agents for free 5 Nights / 6 Days Kerala Package Itinerary with Houseboat Experience Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Kochi(1N) ₹ 16,999 11% off ₹14,999/person Get Offers> 7 Nights / 8 Days Marvellous Kerala Tour Package for 7 Nights 8 Days Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Ko... ₹ 28,470 11% off ₹25,185/person Get Offers> 5 Nights / 6 Days Romantic 5N/6D Monsoon Honeymoon Package Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(1N) → Alleppey(1N) → Kochi(1N) Sold By: Jonjes Holidays(4.7 ) ₹ 20,000 7% off ₹18,500/person Get Offers> 6 Nights / 7 Days Kerala Tour Package with Kumarakom and Houseboat Stay Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Kumarakom(2N) → Alappuzha(1N) ₹28,900/person Get Offers> 4 Nights / 5 Days Alleppry Munnar Kochi Tour Package for 4 Nights Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Alleppey(1N) Sold By: Zoom Yatra Holidays Pvt Ltd(5.0 ) ₹ 12,000 12% off ₹10,500/person Get Offers> 8 Nights / 9 Days Romantic 9 Days Kerala Honeymoon Holiday Package Kochi(1N) → Munnar(2N) → Thekkady(2N) → Alappuzha (1N) &rar... Cheeyappara Waterfalls, Munnar 4.2 /5 Located on the Kochi-Madurai Highway (National Highway 49), the Cheeyarappa Falls is an on-the-way tourist attraction. It falls between Munnar and Kochi, in the district of Idukki, Kerala. One of the largest waterfalls near Kochi and in Kerala (which is also known as God's own country), the Cheyyappara Falls are a sight to behold. Cascading through seven tiers of stones, these falls are a force of nature that you can not only see and experience but dip your toes into and enjoy. Distance from Kochi: 83 kms Read More Which of these waterfalls near Kochi have you visited?
